E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
Our fans aren't really happy about the loss of Tony Phillips.
The overall fan interest decreases slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Barry Bonds



Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Ozzie Guillen



Date: Friday, 2/3/1991
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Pittsburgh has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Barry Bonds



Date: Wednesday, 2/8/1991
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with Los Angeles!

Regards,
Ozzie Guillen

Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Status of Greg Myers
Dear Sir,
Greg Myers shouldn't play at AA San Antonio Missions!
He has an AVG of .239 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Robert Person
Dear Sir,
Robert Person has an ERA of 2.41 at AA San Antonio Missions!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
